descriptionHtml:
Thor Eye Candy - for NPC\'s
==========================

TEC_NPC_Undies
==============

Hairy
No old wrinkles
No aflicted body

Installation - Just add the meshes and textures folders to your skyrim data folder.
Uninstallation - Delete all my folders/files
(Make sure you don\'t delete files belonging to other mods, which may be installed in the same folders as mine).

Thor

Affected Human Female NPC\'s
===========================
archmage        = undies1 by Rowan Leeves (grey)
barkeeper       = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
beggarclothes   = undies3 by Thor (default etched)
blacksmith      = undies4 by Rekicker (chainmail)
chef            = undies5 by Rowan Leeves (red)
farmclothes01   = undies6 by Thor (default etched; pink)
farmclothes02   = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
farmclothes03   = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
farmclothes04   = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
fineclothes01   = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
fineclothes02   = undies5 by Rowan Leeves (red)
mageapprentice  = undies1 by Rowan Leeves (grey)
magejourneyman  = undies1 by Rowan Leeves (grey)
merchantclothes = undies2 by Rowan Leeves (white)
minerclothes    = undies4 by Rekicker (chainmail)
redguard        = undies4 by Rekicker (chainmail)
wench           = undies5 by Rowan Leeves (red)

My ALL NUDE NPC Variant (Adults only):
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=538

PERMISSIONS:
============
Free to use for your own mods, provided you give credit to all parties involved.
Please do not repost at any other site.
